mapper.insert: insert into interestarea(userId, dongCode, date) values (#{userId}, #{dongCode}, now())
mapper.select: select i.no, b.sidoName, b.gugunName, b.dongName, b.dongCode, b.lat, b.lng from baseaddress b join interestarea i on b.dongCode = i.dongCode where i.userId = #{userId};
mapper.insert: insert into interestapt(userId, aptNo, date) values (#{userId}, #{aptNo}, now())
mapper.select: select i.aptNo as no, h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.dongCode, si.sidoName, gu.gugunName, h.dongName, h.buildYear, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, h.img, d.dealAmount, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, d.area, d.floor from houseinfo h inner join housedeal d on h.aptCode = d.aptCode left join sidocode si on left(h.dongCode,2) = left(si.sidoCode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongCode,5) = left(gu.gugunCode,5) inner join interestapt i on i.aptNo = d.no where i.userId = #{userId};
mapper.delete: delete from interestapt where userId = #{userId} and aptNo = #{aptNo}
